description: This file implements advanced processing functions for an HTTP Webs Trans Object, including query handling, receiving payloads, sending responses, and finishing transactions. It contains functions related to HTTP connection state management and data processing within a server environment.

methods.name: ULONG HttpWstoQuery(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hBufferContext)
methods.description: Determines the processing mode based on the current HTTP message state and buffer content.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpWstoRecv(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hBufferContext)
methods.description: Processes received payloads, updates session state, and manages connection closure based on transaction progress.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpWstoSend(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hMessage,ULONG ulSendFlags)
methods.description: Handles the sending of HTTP responses, including headers and body, and manages connection state.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpWstoFinish(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hBufferContext)
methods.description: Finalizes the transaction when the client connection is closed, releasing resources as needed.
